welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tizayuca, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful place has to offer. Bienvenidos!

restaurants.name: Latte Café & Deli
restaurants.description: Latte Café & Deli is a café located in Tizayuca.

restaurants.name: Asados Don Abel Asado De Jabali
restaurants.description: Asados Don Abel Asado De Jabali is a taco restaurant located in Tizayuca.

restaurants.description: Tacos "El Güero" is a taco restaurant located in Nuevo Tizayuca.

restaurants.name: Restaurant Cecina De Kalidad Tizayuca Hgo
restaurants.description: Restaurant Cecina De Kalidad Tizayuca Hgo is a bbq joint located in Tizayuca Municipality.

restaurants.name: Quesadillas del Nuevo
restaurants.description: Quesadillas del Nuevo is a mexican restaurant located in Nuevo Tizayuca.
restaurants.address: Lirio (Flor De Loto), 43800 Nuevo Tizayuca, Hidalgo

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and busiest terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, serving mostly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name and password can be obtained from the information desk.
